<<<<<<< Updated upstream
To run locally
    bundle exec jekyll serve

=======
To run locally:
    bundle exec jekyll serve

Probably the best starting place if dependency is broken
    bundle update github-pages

>>>>>>> Stashed changes
To update ruby vulnerabilities, run
    sudo gem install <library e.g. ffi>



To update:
    bundle update github-pages

To propagate changes to Gemfile.lock file,
    sudo bundle update
    (need to run separately inside _sites/ directory)
